title: FIRST BLOOD: The Stats Behind The Slaughter

replies.body: You seem to have a typo. It would be having ignite on F. Thought I'd fix it for you.
But F is for Flash...
If you're a degenerate who wants his core keys far from the center of his hand.
my hand is bigger than my entire keyboard what now
I wonder how far away from the computer Ivern has to sit for his long arms to fit comfortably
F is on your pointer finger, which is more dexterous than the middle finger. Speaking of the middle finger....  ;)
THAT'S WHY YOU NEED IT FOR FLASH THO
http://i.kinja-img.com/gawker-media/image/upload/s--Ph5HSriG--/uuwl58fjm1h1pthed8fe.gif
Don't worry boom bear, I'm with you. F is for Flash, D is for ignite, it just makes sense.
Ignite really does say screw you tho so the middle finger on D makes sense LOL

_sigh _

\-  _pings enemy ignite_
Or you could just use the middle mouse button. Much easier, and far more civilized.
an emphatic, reflexive "wat" escaped my lips upon reading this

Dear god, what kind of backwards world do you live in?
Middle mouse button is for trinkets.
Middle Mouse is obviously for mastery spam you scrub lord
what the fuck is wrong with you
Dude, you just want to watch the world burn don't you?
d is for dlash
Yes, F is for Ignite, and D is for Exhaust.
Janna is too underpowered. 1.7% first blood? Please buff.
legends say her autoattack still hasn't reached its target

Too bad you fixed the projectile speed on Raka (for when you go ADC. IK this is an update that belongs in a museum, but back in the day, if you went straight AS Raka, the bananas would move at the same rate. End result; 500 bananas chasing you indefinitely. Oh, and upwards 30K phisical damage in .5s)
And yet she gets more of a win rate increase with FB than any other true support.

Glad I'm not the only one who noticed this.

From rank 134 for first blood, to rank 50 for win rate boost. The lesson here is clear.
**Give Janna the kill.**
What are the win rates for the team that takes Rift Herald? Poor guy never gets any attention.

What's Rift He- uh, I mean... yeah! We can totally do that!

Over the same timeframe, the team that got first Rift Herald also won the game 75% of the time. notbad.jpg

>**first** Rift Herald
lolwut
it ain't wrong
*dead* lmao
81.5% WR to the team who gets baron. That should be perfectly clear that baron is over tuned and needs to get Nerfed...

Although Baron is a pretty powerful lad, the team that snags Baron usually tends to be pretty far ahead. It's possible (and probably likely) that the huge win rate for first Baron has a lot to do with that.

Also, if you really think Baron needs a nerf, I bet Dignitas would agree with you.
boom bear handing out burns {{sticker:slayer-pantheon-popcorn}}

But that isn't always the case. You see it all the time the team behind will try to sneak it in to stay in the game, and most of the time it will work. You see it even in the LCS. 

Sure, I agree the team ahead normally secures Baron, but in any scenario, getting baron should not mean the game is over.

I mean, look at the FOX vs NV game. Fox got a 10k baron power play and they were behind in gold at the time if I remember correctly. Snuck it in NV was recalling. Literally got 6 turrets and 2 inhibs in 3.5 minutes.

Definitely true that it's not always the case! In fact, I'd register a completely non-data-backed guess that it could happen even more in super high level play.

My only point is that the chance of winning of a team likely isn't jumping from 50% to 80% just because of grabbing baron. Appreciate the call out and examples though, all really good points.
Not necessarily. The team that gets baron is often times already winning.

And gets baron via a slaughter...   I don't see anything wrong with the Baron numbers. 

There's 3 ways you typically get baron. 1) kill enemies/team, take turrets/inhibitors, then take Baron.  2) kill Baron will it is being contested by enemy team. Likely a fight just before or after. 3) sneak Baron. 

1 and 2 generally happen due to a better team/comp that likely would have won anyways.

You drop ignite (which is bound to "D," like a civilized human)
finally rito agrees with me
now i can call my friends uncultured swines
this is our time

Evelynn is getting ignored in every situation...
Let's look at the rankings:
1. Talon
2. Pantheon
3. Katarina
5. LeBlanc
Don't worry there's also the junglers!
Lee and Kha and Elise!

That's definitely something we wanted to do, but time + word count meant it got the chopping block. Maybe another post!
